author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Netherlands joins the expanding network of Travelport - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Netherlands joins the expanding network of Travelport Published on : Thursday, September 24, 2015
Travelport-logo
Travelport Hotelzon, a leading hotel distribution technology provider for the B2B travel industry, has announced that the Netherlands is the latest country to join its expanding European network. This latest country entry and the appointment of a new sales leader based in the Netherlands, reinforces Travelport Hotelzon’s ongoing expansion plans which commenced one year ago when Travelport acquired the company.
Sebastiaan van der Kroon, the newly appointed local Sales Manager will be based in Amsterdam and will have full responsibility for Travelport Hotelzon’s sales activity across the country. Van der Kroon joins from MI Airline, an airline technology provider, where he held the role of Global Sales Executive.
Daniel Guillou, Travelport Hotelzon’s Managing Director, commented: “Travelport Hotelzon is seeing a major expansion across Europe, and this new entry strengthens the growing sales team that we are establishing. We’re investing heavily on our expansion plans and continue to be extremely focused on delivering leading distribution technology in the hotel and corporate travel space.”
